channel.title: How do i change the text in the welcome text!
channel.description:
like when it says welcome to Cumscape
go to website forums
i want to change it to go to my forums

item.title: How do i change the text in the welcome text!
item.dc:creator: @lordante lordante
item.description:
@lordante wrote:

omg…
If the complier aint working then make sure yor JDK is the same as the complier.
Right click the complier, click on edit, and change the JDK number to 12 or whatever JDK you got.
Then try to complie once your done.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the text in the welcome text!

item.source: How do i change the text in the welcome text!

item.title: How do i change the text in the welcome text!
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

  1. Open up your source.
  2. Open up client.java
  3. Press CTRL + F
  4. Search for what it says when you log in now.
  5. Change that to what you want it to be.
  6. Save, compile and run.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the text in the welcome text!

item.title: How do i change the text in the welcome text!

item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

You don’t need to be experienced to be able to bring up the ‘find’ search in notepad. Ctrl+F
